rooms.name: Lobby/Entrance
rooms.description: Entry hall with floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light and an open airy feel.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment - Living/Dining Area
rooms.description: A multi-functional space combining living, dining, and a workspace. Features industrial design elements with exposed brickwork and floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring maximum brightness.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Fully equipped fitness area with specialized flooring, built-in mirrors, and ventilation system.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Compact but efficient kitchen space integrated into the studio apartment layout.

openings.features: floor-to-ceiling windows for enhanced natural light
